main.0: v4l2src ! video/x-raw,width=1280,height=720,framerate=30/1 ! videoconvert ! video/x-raw,format=RGB ! tee name=RAW_TEE ! queue ! tee name=MAIN_TEE ! queue ! opencvtextoverlay text="" name=TEXT ypos=100 height=3 width=3 thickness=10 ! videoconvert ! avenc_mpeg4 ! tee name=H264_TEE ! queue ! fakesink
main.0_test: v4l2src ! video/x-raw,width=1280,height=720,framerate=30/1 ! tee name=RAW_TEE ! queue ! tee name=MAIN_TEE ! queue !  videoconvert ! opencvtextoverlay text="" name=TEXT ypos=100 height=3 width=3 thickness=10 ! videoconvert ! avenc_mpeg4 ! tee name=H264_TEE ! queue ! rtpmp4vpay pt=96 ! udpsink host=192.168.0.35 port=4000 name=sink_%u sync=f

streaming: queue ! rtpmp4vpay pt=96 ! gdppay ! tcpserversink name=sink_%u sync=f
pre_recording_init: queue min-threshold-time=10000000000 max-size-buffers=0 max-size-time=0 max-size-bytes=0 ! valve drop=true ! tee name=sink_%u
copy_shm: queue ! videorate ! video/x-raw,framerate=1/1 ! videoscale ! video/x-raw,width=640,height=480 ! videoconvert ! video/x-raw,format=BGR ! appsink name=sink_%u
show_window: queue ! videorate ! video/x-raw,framerate=10/1 ! videoscale ! video/x-raw,width=640,height=480 ! autovideosink name=sink_%u
